Also the temperatures showed very high temperatures like 298 degrees. My favourite watch please fix this when you can.

author: Mr MACKnificent
comment: Great app sorry that I couldn't give it the fifth star because it drains the HELL out of the battery hopefully soon an update will fix battery problem 4 stars have to do for now
title: Advantage and Disadvantage

author: Gary Anderson
comment: Alternate time zones are reversed in the settings app but otherwise great digital face. I would like to see a step counter in future releases.
title: Great Face

comment: Awesome app no probs works great looks good !

author: William Austin
comment: The only problem I can see is that it drains the battery  (Motorola 360) too quickly.  HOWEVER I knew that BEFORE I bought it, so that wasn't  a "gotcha" - just something to plan for.  So I don't use it as my regular  face - just when I need it.  Excellent and I'd buy it again.
title: Excellent - Does exactly what it's supposed to.

author: Tom Dilbeck
comment: Everything I need on one face. Like the optimizations. Great product.
title: Who needs a Garmin D2 Bravo?

title: Good

author: v cayer
comment: the only thing needed is to fix time zone! atlantic time zone should be -05:00 and not -04:00. also, some time zone do not respect dst therefore it would be nice to have a toggle on/off option!  Please, add an update to fix the battery issue!!
title: great app!
